"We were just thrilled to be by her side," Debbie Wasserman Schultz recalled of her visit to the hospital Wednesday night, along with House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and New York Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand . And we were prepared to do and say anything- if she could hear us- to provide comfort and encouragement. Gabrielle Giffords lay in her hospital bed with her eyes closed, swathed in bandages. With her was her husband, Mark Kelly. The three women gathered around her, Debbie Wasserman Schultz recalled in an interview.
